A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is a brutally low score by viewers\, most likely a knee jerk reaction to the disappointment of failing to meet the same standard as its incredibly well received predecessor. The film certainly has its flaws\, most notably its surprising additions and subtractions of fundamental characters\, like the cheesy use of Yoda\, and the odd loss of Luke. That being said\, the film still served its most important function\, to develop all the key players and set the stage for the final showdown\, and it did it with enough humor and creativity to keep me more than intrigued.
